Engineers with consulting background comfortable with client stakeholder interaction

summary.overall_assessment: Solid opportunity for senior data engineer specializing in process mining and ERP data integration. Modern tech stack with Databricks/Snowflake, clear technical focus, and international consulting exposure. Main concerns are lack of salary transparency, unclear team structure, and performance-focused culture that may indicate intensity. Strong fit for those with process mining expertise seeking consulting-adjacent data engineering role.
